problem_text_cn: 如图,正三角形的边长为6,点P为BC边上一点,且PC=4,D为AC上一点,∠APD=60°,则CD的长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the edge length of an equilateral triangle is N_0, point P is a point on BC, and PC = N_1, D is a point on AC, ∠APD = N_2, then the length of CD is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查了相似三角形的性质和判定,三角形的内角和定理,等边三角形的性质定理等知识点的应用,关键是能推出△CPD∽△BAP．
